context.p: A Product is an independently deployable artifact, characterised by a specific Product-Type and Product-Flavour. A Deployment consists of one or more of these Products. A Product-Type is a named artifact consisting of a range of different Product-Flavour variations.
When adding a new Product to a Deployment, the Product-Flavour name chosen must be one of the names specified within the chosen Product-Type.
Create a new Product-Type within the PDU OSS Deployment Tracking Tool.

prereq.p: To create a new Product-Type the user must have the following:

info.p: Click the Product-Types link in the navigation bar.
Click the Create new Product-Type button.
Enter the details as shown below.
NOTE: Any restrictions on the fields are outlined.

ul.li: Strict Configuration: With Strict Configuration 'On', user will not be able to add additional product configuration fields when creating/editing a Deployments Product of this type.
Product-Flavours: A list of Product-Flavour names, relevant to the Product-Type.
Configuration Fields: Add any mandatory fields which need to be populated when creating/editing a Deployments Product of this type.

info.p: Click the Save button, the Product-Type will be created, and the user will be redirected back to the view page for the newly created Product-Type.
NOTE: Product-Type will not save if any fields are invalid (invalid fields are highlighted in red).

result.p: A New Product-Type is created in the PDU OSS Deployment Tracking Tool.
